mapper.sql: select opd.user_id,su.nick_name,opd.order_number,ulo.device_number,opd.proportion,opd.price,IFNULL(ulo.net_amount,0) as amount,IFNULL(ulo.coupon_price,0)as coupon_price,opd.create_time from order_proportion_detail opd left join user_lease_order ulo on opd.order_number = ulo.order_number left join sys_user su on su.user_id = opd.user_id UNION ALL select oiad.user_id,su.nick_name,oiad.order_number,ulo.device_number,oiad.proportion,oiad.price,IFNULL(ulo.net_amount,0) as amount,IFNULL(ulo.coupon_price,0)as coupon_price,oiad.create_time from order_investor_acount_detail oiad left join user_lease_order ulo on oiad.order_number = ulo.order_number left join sys_user su on su.user_id = oiad.user_id

select oaad.user_id,su.nick_name,oaad.order_number,ulo.device_number,oaad.proportion,oaad.price,IFNULL(ulo.net_amount,0) as amount,IFNULL(ulo.coupon_price,0)as coupon_price,oaad.create_time from order_agent_account_detail oaad left join user_lease_order ulo on oaad.order_number = ulo.order_number left join sys_user su on su.user_id = oaad.user_id

select oahd.user_id,su.nick_name,oahd.order_number,ulo.device_number,oahd.proportion,oahd.price,IFNULL(ulo.net_amount,0) as amount,IFNULL(ulo.coupon_price,0)as coupon_price,oahd.create_time from order_agent_hospital_detail oahd left join user_lease_order ulo on oahd.order_number = ulo.order_number left join sys_user su on su.user_id = oahd.user_id

select DATE_FORMAT(lease_time,'%Y')year,COUNT(id) orderSum, SUM(price)as businessAmount,SUM(net_amount)as paidAmount, SUM(coupon_price)as discountAmount, SUM((net_amount*platformProportion/100))as platformDivision, SUM((net_amount*investorProportion/100))as investorDivision, SUM((net_amount*agentProportion/100))as agentDivision, SUM((net_amount*hospitalProportion/100))as hospitalDivision from user_lease_order GROUP BY year

select DATE_FORMAT(lease_time,'%Y-%m')month,COUNT(id) orderSum, SUM(price)as businessAmount,SUM(net_amount)as paidAmount, SUM(coupon_price)as discountAmount, SUM((net_amount*platformProportion/100))as platformDivision, SUM((net_amount*investorProportion/100))as investorDivision, SUM((net_amount*agentProportion/100))as agentDivision, SUM((net_amount*hospitalProportion/100))as hospitalDivision from user_lease_order GROUP BY month

select DATE_FORMAT(lease_time,'%Y-%m-%d')day,COUNT(id) orderSum, SUM(price)as businessAmount,SUM(net_amount)as paidAmount, SUM(coupon_price)as discountAmount, SUM((net_amount*platformProportion/100))as platformDivision, SUM((net_amount*investorProportion/100))as investorDivision, SUM((net_amount*agentProportion/100))as agentDivision, SUM((net_amount*hospitalProportion/100))as hospitalDivision from user_lease_order GROUP BY day

select opd.user_id,su.nick_name,COUNT(ulo.order_number) orderSum, SUM(ulo.price)as businessAmount,SUM(ulo.net_amount)as paidAmount, SUM(ulo.coupon_price)as discountAmount, SUM(opd.price)as investorDivision from user_lease_order ulo left join order_proportion_detail opd on ulo.order_number = opd.order_number left join sys_user su on opd.user_id = su.user_id group by su.nick_name

select oaad.user_id,su.nick_name,COUNT(ulo.order_number) orderSum, SUM(ulo.price)as businessAmount,SUM(ulo.net_amount)as paidAmount, SUM(ulo.coupon_price)as discountAmount, SUM(oaad.price)as agentDivision from user_lease_order ulo left join order_agent_account_detail oaad on ulo.order_number = oaad.order_number left join sys_user su on oaad.user_id = su.user_id group by su.nick_name

select oahd.user_id,su.nick_name,COUNT(ulo.order_number) orderSum, SUM(ulo.price)as businessAmount,SUM(ulo.net_amount)as paidAmount, SUM(ulo.coupon_price)as discountAmount, SUM(oahd.price)as hospitalDivision from user_lease_order ulo left join order_agent_hospital_detail oahd on ulo.order_number = oahd.order_number left join sys_user su on oahd.user_id = su.user_id group by su.nick_name

select su.user_id,su.nick_name,COUNT(ulo.order_number) orderSum, SUM(ulo.price)as businessAmount,SUM(ulo.net_amount)as paidAmount, SUM(ulo.coupon_price)as discountAmount, SUM((ulo.net_amount*ulo.agentHospitalProportion/100))as hospitalDivision from user_lease_order ulo left join sys_user su on ulo.hospitalId = su.hospital_id group by su.nick_name
